tags.name: include
tags.description: Loads file/value in place of the element, else replaces itself with its children. Can also use parameters like Django.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: URL of html file whose content will replace this element. Defaults if file not found.

attributes.name: onreplace
attributes.description: Executed when `include` element has successfully been replaced by its contents. Equivalent to 'replace' event and success property true.

attributes.name: ondefault
attributes.description: Executed when `include` element has been replaced by its default value. Equivalent to 'replace' event and success property false.

attributes.name: key
attributes.description:
Parent parameters separated by spaces, whose value will replace this element. Checks next parameter if current parameter not found. Defaults if none of the parameters are found.

Parent: `<include src='' s='34' f='69'></include>`

Child: `<include key='a s d f'></include>`

Output: `34`

attributes.name: param-
attributes.description:
Use extension as qualifiedName. Change value from parent parameter to its equivalent value.

Parent: `<include src='' a='12'></include>`

Child: `<include src='' param-z='a'></include>`

Output: `<include src=' z='12'></include>`
